name: commercialized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
organized in order to make a profit: What a pity Christmas has become so commercialized. The mountains are remarkably unspoilt and much less commercialized than the coastal resorts. See
commercialize
More examplesFewer examplesThe park is an increasingly popular destination for walkers, and its foothill villages are becoming more and more commercialized each year. Eighty-five percent said the holiday was too commercialized.Their folkcrafts are authentic and much less commercialized than in most other parts of the country.
